Gate Cleaver

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 99
siege bonus [siegebonus]: +50
weap id [weapon]: 169 (Gate Cleaver)
damage [dmg]: 29
attack [att]: -1
defence [def]: -1
length [len]: 2
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Armor Negating [armornegating], Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 15E to forge (E3)

This enormous axe can chop through anything, be it flesh, stone or steel. The axe is somewhat cumbersome to use in combat, but it works wonders when used against enemy castle gates. A besieging commander who has this axe will be able to breach the castle walls with ease.
